Package com.illcode.meterman.impl

Contains various base classes and implementations for rooms and entities.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContainerListener
    An interface to support notification when an item is put in or taken out of a Container.
    EntityDelegate
    An interface that allows you to proxy calls to certain methods of a BaseEntity.
    RoomDelegate
    An interface that allows you to proxy calls to certain methods of a BaseRoom.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseEntity
    An Entity implementation that supports various standard features, and can be used as a starting point for more game-specific subclasses.
    BaseRoom
    A Room implementation that supports various standard features, and can be used as a starting point for more game-specific implementations.
    BasicActions  
    BasicUtils
    Utility methods that operate on the various classes in com.illcode.meterman.impl.
    BasicWorldManager
    A manager (global listener for various game events) that handles basic world interactions.
    Container
    This class represents anything that can contain, support, or in a similar way hold a set of entities as contents.
    DarkRoom
    A Room that handles darkness by returning a different name, exit name, and description if the room is dark and there is no light source.
    Door
    A door is a special usage entity that can connect and disconnect two rooms, depending on whether it is locked.
    EntityDelegateAdapter
    An empty EntityDelegate implementation that can be subclassed to override specific methods.
    FrameImageManager
    FrameImageManager maintains a mapping from BaseRoom IDs to image names, and when the player moves rooms it will set the UI frame image accordingly.
    Pathfinder
    Finds the shortest path between two rooms, if one exists, taking into account unlocked DoorS.
    RoomDelegateAdapter
    An empty RoomDelegate implementation that can be subclassed to override specific methods.
    TalkingEntity
    An entity that supports "conversations" in the form of TalkTopicS.
    TalkTopic
    Represents a topic of discussion with an NPC

    NOTE: since TalkTopics are always retrieved from a topicMap, and thus the same TalkTopic instance will always be retrieved for a given key, we can compare and hash TalkTopics by identity, and don't need to write hashCode and equals methods.
    WorldBuilder
    A class with utility methods to assist generating the initial world state of a game, using the BaseEntity and BaseRoom implementations.

Package com.illcode.meterman.impl Description

Contains various base classes and implementations for rooms and entities.

Some of these may be useful in designing your own world model, and some are provided as examples of how certain features could be implemented. The interface-based nature of rooms and entities admits of rather idiosyncratic world models in individual games, so for unusual effects you might like to write your own implementations.
